<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Set a product administrator"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/2.0/settings/security/administrator"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Sets the selected user as an administrator of a product with the ID specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["productId","userId"],"type":"object","properties":{"productId":{"type":"string","description":"The product ID for which permissions are being set.","format":"uuid","example":"aae1e103-bca5-9fa1-ba8c-42058b4abf28"},"userId":{"type":"string","description":"The ID of the user whose permissions are being configured.","format":"uuid","example":"aae1e103-bca5-9fa1-ba8c-42058b4abf28"},"administrator":{"type":"boolean","description":"Specifies whether the user has administrative privileges.","example":true}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The request parameters for managing user security and access permissions.","title":"SecurityRequestsDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Object with the user security information: product ID, user ID, administrator or not","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"response":{"type":"object","properties":{"productId":{"type":"string","description":"The product ID.","format":"uuid","example":"aae1e103-bca5-9fa1-ba8c-42058b4abf28"},"userId":{"type":"string","description":"The user unique identifier.","format":"uuid","example":"aae1e103-bca5-9fa1-ba8c-42058b4abf28"},"administrator":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates whether the user has administrator privileges for the product.","example":true}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The product administrator parameters.","title":"ProductAdministratorDto"},"count":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"links":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"href":{"type":"string"},"action":{"type":"string"}}}},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"statusCode":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}},"title":"ProductAdministratorWrapper"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"402":{"description":"Your pricing plan does not support this option"},"403":{"description":"Only portal owner can set user as administrator"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
